actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the testimony of Gregory Allen Gay before a confidential proceeding of the State of Florida Bar, Fifteenth Judicial Grievance Committee A.

summary.text: Authorizes Gregory Gay, an employee of Senator Hawkins, to testify before a confidential proceeding of the State of Florida Bar, Fifteenth Judicial Circuit Grievance Committee A.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the testimony of Gregory Allen Gay before a confidential proceeding of the State of Florida Bar, Fifteenth Judicial Grievance Committee A.
